response.overview: Fifty years into the future, the sun is dying, and Earth is threatened by arctic temperatures. A team of astronauts is sent to revive the Sun — but the mission fails. Seven years later, a new team is sent to finish the mission as mankind’s last hope.
response.tagline: Just look out for a little extra brightness in the sky.
response.title: Sunshine

titles.title: ยุทธการสยบพระอาทิตย์

release_dates.note: Brussels International Festival of Fantasy Films
